Name: Project Gunship
About the game: Project Gunship is a single-player, AC-130 simulation game, showcasing AC-130 variants used throughout history. Be prepared to engage enemy infantry, vehicles, and destructible buildings with a variety of weapons and munitions. Key Features Destructible Environments - Watch buildings crumble into pieces as you hammer them with 105mm high explosives Weapons & Munitions - Choose from a variety of weapons & munitions to engage the enemy with. Each serving a specific purpose, choose the right tool for the right job. Dynamic Game play - AI reactions will be different every time. Play and replay scenarios with a different result Infestation - Ease some tension by squeezing the trigger against hordes of incoming zombies
